title: Executive Order 5628-Authorizing the Appointment of Mrs. Amy Cowing
content: Mrs. Amy Cowing may be appointed as a clerk-typist in the Department of Agriculture without reference to the provisions of the civil-service rules.
This order is issued upon the recommendation of the Secretary of Agriculture.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5628-Authorizing the Appointment of Mrs. Amy Cowing Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361232
